akas: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum USA
akas from release info: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum USA

1.title: Født i feil land

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

1.plot: Jan-Ove meets Odd Nerdrum's son, Öde, in New York to explore Nerdrum's early years and the Nordic painters that inspired his work.

2.title: 85% Sort

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

2.plot: Seeking to understand Odd Nerdrum's period of Social Realism in the 1970s, Jan-Ove and Öde travel to Rome, where they examine the works of Caravaggio.

3.title: Etter Armageddon

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

3.plot: Jan-Ove and Öde travel to Iceland to locate the source of inspiration for Odd Nerdrum's allegorical imagery.

4.title: Malerkongen

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

4.plot: At the Rijksmuseum in Amsterdam, Jan-Ove and Öde explore the works of Rembrandt before they travel to America to look at Nerdrum's breakthrough in New York and the catastrophic oil that lead to his social downfall.

5.title: Oppløsningen

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

5.plot: The late style of Titian is examined as Jan-Ove and Öde travel to Florence and Vienna to discover the secret behind the techniques of Nerdrum and the old masters.

6.title: Den første renessanse

episode of.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum (TV Series 2018)

6.plot: To fully comprehend Nerdrum's development as a painter, Jan-Ove and Öde go on a journey through history and visit the origin of Western Civilization.

imdb.plot outline: During his long career, painter Odd Nerdrum has taken on various techniques in his work, following a period of realism in the '70s to the baroque and grotesque in the present. Deciding to track down Nerdrum's sources of inspiration, his former pupil Tuv and his son Öde go on a world tour visiting the museums and people that crossed paths with the Master painter on his everlasting journey in pursuit of the immortal masterpiece.
imdb.title: The Hunt of Odd Nerdrum
plot: Deciding to track down Odd Nerdrum's sources of inspiration, his former pupil Jan-Ove Tuv and his son Öde go on a world tour, visiting the museums and people that crossed paths with the painter in his pursuit of the immortal masterpiece.::Bork S. Nerdrum

During his long career, painter Odd Nerdrum has taken on various techniques in his work, following a period of realism in the '70s to the baroque and grotesque in the present. Deciding to track down Nerdrum's sources of inspiration, his former pupil Tuv and his son Öde go on a world tour visiting the museums and people that crossed paths with the Master painter on his everlasting journey in pursuit of the immortal masterpiece.::Bork S.
